info.title: Desygner API
info.description: Desygner and We Brand API documentation

get.summary: Navigate directly to a design
get.description: Design access will be restricted to creation in Desygner, but shared among users in the Workspace

parameters.name: encoded_id
parameters.description: Should be the encoded_id in the design schema

200.description: After checking the active session, the user will land in the editor with the design open

403.description: If the User is not authorized, or he doesn't belong to the Workspace, or the session has expired!

get.summary: Create Screen
get.description: When entering the Create Screen we can pass certain parameters in order to modify the natural creation flow or to speed things up

parameters.name: landing_format
parameters.description: The format for the templates to show to the User

403.description: If the User is not authorized, or he doesn't belong to the Workspace, or the session has expired!

get.summary: Navigate to a Workspace
get.description: Navigate the user to a Workspace under Desygner domain ([{host_id}.]desygner.com)

200.description: You will be redirected to the Workspace without leaving [{host_id}.]desygner.com

403.description: If the User is not authorized, or he doesn't belong to the Workspace, or the session has expired!

post.summary: Get User level access by passing SSO token
post.description: In order to access Desygner and We Brand credentials in a server to server communication scenario, we provide a bridge endpoint that, when passed a Single Sign On token parameter, returns the User access details and credentials linked.

requestBody.description: Single Sign On bearer token

post.summary: Clone designs
post.description: This could be used to copy a design to another Workspace according the User restrictions

requestBody.description: The id and cover (first page thumbnail url) of the original design

200.description: Retreives the cloned design

403.description: If the User is not authorized, or he doesn't belong to the Workspace, or the session has expired!
